titleStmt.title: The antiquity of the Quakers proved out of the Scriptures of truth published in love to the papists, Protestants, Presbyterians, Independents, & Anabaptists : with a salutation of pure love to all the tender hearted Welsh-men but more especially to Flint-shire, Denbigh-shire, Carenarvon-shire, and Anglesea / by Thomas Wynne.
titleStmt.author: Wynne, Thomas.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
